content: looking for a project that will add a bit of spice to your style then look no further then the amaya crochet shrug this wearable can be closed in the front as a shrug or worn open like a shawl the geometric lines of the fabric make it a stunning and flattering piece to wear made in we crochet s heatherly yarn the shrug is soft warm and cozy the gentle palette of the heatherly line all seamlessly coordinate and any colors you choose will look incredible wecrochet heatherly worsted 80% acrylic/ 20% merino wool 218 yds / 199 m 3 5 oz/ 100 g cyca# 4 worsted 1 color a #29557 snowflake 2 2 3 3 hanks color b #29550 butter 1 1 2 3 hanks color c #29549 peach fuzz 1 1 1 1 hank color d #29556 gravity 2 2 2 2 hanks ✅ available on etsy here 2 1 http //shrsl com/3aatl 2 http //shrsl com/4pjwg
